snippet: Firing bad educators won’t close the achievement gap.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Jesse Rothstein criticizes California Judge Rolf M Treu's ruling striking down state's teacher-tenure system; contend ruling ignores trade-offs inherent in decisions about firing teachers; contends that, in schools across nation, attacking tenure does little to close the achievement gap and risks compounding the problem.
lead_paragraph: Firing bad educators won’t close the achievement gap.

headline.seo: California Ruling on Teacher Tenure Is Not Whole Picture
